about_the_game:
Keep'em flying avaitor!

War rages on in the backyards and peaceful rooms of suburbia! Enlist now to defend freedom on the miniature battlefield of World War II. The call to duty echoes in the skies as both American and Japanese sides seek valiant pilots, fearless gunners, and vigilant AA-specialists. The sky's no limit* for those who dare to rewrite history!

Models may be small, but the fun is larger than life!

Take control of over 20 customizable planes as a fearless fighter pilot or the valiant crew of a mighty bomber. Secure the skies as you take aim at enemy airfields from the AA gunner's seat or unleash devastation by raining bombs on their airstrips and bases. Victory begins with you!

Don't just fight mindlessly!

Your mission is clear – join the ranks and complete critical objectives. Engage the enemy alone, or unite with comrades in cooperative missions or challenge your friends in epic multiplayer battles. Taste victory alone or share it!

Pick up Your loadout!

Gather pickups and upgrades to gain the edge over your adversaries. Seize the advantage as you collect valuable resources and enhance your miniature war machine!

Not enough missions for you and your comrades?

You think You can think of better missions? Well, you might be right, and that's why the Editor is at your disposal. Forge your own destiny, create missions that challenge the best, and prove that you are the ultimate ace of the skies!

*There is literal limit You can fly. Be real. This is game about model planes fighting Pacific Area WW2 in someones back yard, not space program

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Engage in thrilling household air battles in this wacky game. Choose your role as a skilled pilot or a sharp-shooting gunner, and customize your aircraft to fit your preferred playstyle. Take on daring missions or challenge friends in multiplayer combat. Relive history and dominate the skies!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
